page.title: 03LINDSAY PORTEOUS
page.content: Lindsay's father brought him a present of a Jew's Harp from the Scout Jamboree in l95l.34 years later the Porteous house holds over lOO inst- ruments.Many have been made by Lindsay himself, though he has been trained in neither music nor woodwork.He became interested in old instruments from pictures in encyclopaediae-he tried to copy them.Friends in other Folk Groups asked him to make or mend instruments. Travelling abroad with his folk group, he collected instruments and orders. Folk groups-his biggest source of orders -though sells many in mother's shop-mainly skin-covered drums.Coll- ection includes Jew's Harps(Trumps) from England, Austria, Italy,Afghan- istan; Mouthbow; Ocarinas-reproduction Mexican 4OO-5OO AD; whistles,dulcimers French Epinette des Vosges,Gaboulet, Ton-ton,Hurdy-gurdy,Rumanian pan-pipes
